languages.text: "Что вы, конечно, нет!" {n}Кассия почти вскрикивает, но тут же смущенно отводит взгляд.{/n} "Имморталиум — это символ начала. Отправная точка, в которой зарождаются отношения двух особ, отличные от вежливого безразличия. Пока что это лишь семя, которое вашему другу предстоит взрастить. А вырастет из него ядовитый плющ или прекрасный цветок — покажет лишь время".

traits.locale_text: "Что вы, конечно, нет!" {n}Кассия почти вскрикивает, но тут же смущенно отводит взгляд.{/n} "Имморталиум — это символ начала. Отправная точка, в которой зарождаются отношения двух особ, отличные от вежливого безразличия. Пока что это лишь семя, которое вашему другу предстоит взрастить. А вырастет из него ядовитый плющ или прекрасный цветок — покажет лишь время".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "What? No, of course not!" {n}Cassia almost shouts the words, then looks away in embarrassment.{/n} "An immortalium symbolises a beginning. A starting point from which a relationship between two people can grow, moving beyond polite indifference. For now, it is merely a seed that your friend will have to cultivate. And whether it will grow into poison ivy or a beautiful flower, only time will tell."

А вырастет из него ядовитый плющ или прекрасный цветок — покажет лишь время".

A starting point from which a relationship between two people can grow, moving beyond polite indifference. For now, it is merely a seed that your friend will have to cultivate. And whether it will grow into poison ivy or a beautiful flower, only time will tell."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¿Cómo? ¡No, desde luego que no!». {n}Cassia desvía la mirada, azorada, al darse cuenta de que ha levantado la voz.{/n} «El inmortalium simboliza un comienzo. El momento en que la relación entre dos personas puede crecer y trascender los límites de la indiferencia impuesta por la cortesía. Por ahora no es más que una semilla que su amigo debe cultivar. El tiempo dirá si germina en una hiedra venenosa o en una bella flor».
languages.original_text: "What? No, of course not!" {n}Cassia almost shouts the words, then looks away in embarrassment.{/n} "An immortalium symbolises a beginning. A starting point from which a relationship between two people can grow, moving beyond polite indifference. For now, it is merely a seed that your friend will have to cultivate. And whether it will grow into poison ivy or a beautiful flower, only time will tell."

traits.locale_text: «¿Cómo? ¡No, desde luego que no!». {n}Cassia desvía la mirada, azorada, al darse cuenta de que ha levantado la voz.{/n} «El inmortalium simboliza un comienzo. El momento en que la relación entre dos personas puede crecer y trascender los límites de la indiferencia impuesta por la cortesía. Por ahora no es más que una semilla que su amigo debe cultivar. El tiempo dirá si germina en una hiedra venenosa o en una bella flor».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「え？ とんでもない！」{n}カシアは思わず叫びそうになり、恥ずかしそうに目をそらす。{/n}「イモータリウムは始まりを意味します。ふたりの人間の関係がよそよそしさから脱し、より深まることを示しているのです。今は、あなたのご友人が育てなければならない種の状態です。やがて出てくる芽が毒草に育つか、美しい花に育つかは、時が経ってみないとわかりません」
languages.original_text: "What? No, of course not!" {n}Cassia almost shouts the words, then looks away in embarrassment.{/n} "An immortalium symbolises a beginning. A starting point from which a relationship between two people can grow, moving beyond polite indifference. For now, it is merely a seed that your friend will have to cultivate. And whether it will grow into poison ivy or a beautiful flower, only time will tell."

traits.locale_text: 「え？ とんでもない！」{n}カシアは思わず叫びそうになり、恥ずかしそうに目をそらす。{/n}「イモータリウムは始まりを意味します。ふたりの人間の関係がよそよそしさから脱し、より深まることを示しているのです。今は、あなたのご友人が育てなければならない種の状態です。やがて出てくる芽が毒草に育つか、美しい花に育つかは、時が経ってみないとわかりません」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “什么？不，当然不能！”{n}卡西娅几乎是喊出了这句话，随后尴尬地移开目光。{/n}“永生花象征着开始。两人之间的关系可以以此为起点进一步发展，不必再拘泥于冷淡的礼节。如今它只是一颗种子，需要你的朋友精心呵护，至于它未来会长成一株毒葛，还是一朵美丽的鲜花，只有时间能告诉我们答案。”
languages.original_text: "What? No, of course not!" {n}Cassia almost shouts the words, then looks away in embarrassment.{/n} "An immortalium symbolises a beginning. A starting point from which a relationship between two people can grow, moving beyond polite indifference. For now, it is merely a seed that your friend will have to cultivate. And whether it will grow into poison ivy or a beautiful flower, only time will tell."

traits.locale_text: “什么？不，当然不能！”{n}卡西娅几乎是喊出了这句话，随后尴尬地移开目光。{/n}“永生花象征着开始。两人之间的关系可以以此为起点进一步发展，不必再拘泥于冷淡的礼节。如今它只是一颗种子，需要你的朋友精心呵护，至于它未来会长成一株毒葛，还是一朵美丽的鲜花，只有时间能告诉我们答案。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Quoi ? Non, bien sûr que non ! » {n}répond Cassia en criant presque, avant de détourner le regard d'un air gêné.{/n} « L'immortalium symbolise un commencement, un point à partir duquel une relation entre deux personnes se développe au-delà d'une indifférence polie. Pour l'instant, ce n'est qu'une graine que votre {mf|ami|amie} va devoir faire germer et seul le temps dira si elle donnera une plante vénéneuse ou une fleur ravissante. »
languages.original_text: "What? No, of course not!" {n}Cassia almost shouts the words, then looks away in embarrassment.{/n} "An immortalium symbolises a beginning. A starting point from which a relationship between two people can grow, moving beyond polite indifference. For now, it is merely a seed that your friend will have to cultivate. And whether it will grow into poison ivy or a beautiful flower, only time will tell."

traits.locale_text: « Quoi ? Non, bien sûr que non ! » {n}répond Cassia en criant presque, avant de détourner le regard d'un air gêné.{/n} « L'immortalium symbolise un commencement, un point à partir duquel une relation entre deux personnes se développe au-delà d'une indifférence polie. Pour l'instant, ce n'est qu'une graine que votre {mf|ami|amie} va devoir faire germer et seul le temps dira si elle donnera une plante vénéneuse ou une fleur ravissante. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Was? Nein, natürlich nicht!" {n}Cassia schreit die Worte fast, und blickt dann beschämt weg.{/n} "Ein Immortalium symbolisiert einen Anfang. Den Anfangspunkt, von dem aus die Beziehung zwischen zwei Personen erwachsen kann, sich über höfliche Gleichgültigkeit hinaus entwickeln kann. Noch ist es nur ein Samen, den Euer Freund kultivieren muss. Und nur die Zeit wird zeigen, ob daraus giftiger Efeu oder eine wunderschöne Blume erwächst."
languages.original_text: "What? No, of course not!" {n}Cassia almost shouts the words, then looks away in embarrassment.{/n} "An immortalium symbolises a beginning. A starting point from which a relationship between two people can grow, moving beyond polite indifference. For now, it is merely a seed that your friend will have to cultivate. And whether it will grow into poison ivy or a beautiful flower, only time will tell."

traits.locale_text: "Was? Nein, natürlich nicht!" {n}Cassia schreit die Worte fast, und blickt dann beschämt weg.{/n} "Ein Immortalium symbolisiert einen Anfang. Den Anfangspunkt, von dem aus die Beziehung zwischen zwei Personen erwachsen kann, sich über höfliche Gleichgültigkeit hinaus entwickeln kann. Noch ist es nur ein Samen, den Euer Freund kultivieren muss. Und nur die Zeit wird zeigen, ob daraus giftiger Efeu oder eine wunderschöne Blume erwächst."

languages.original_text: "What? No, of course not!" {n}Cassia almost shouts the words, then looks away in embarrassment.{/n} "An immortalium symbolises a beginning. A starting point from which a relationship between two people can grow, moving beyond polite indifference. For now, it is merely a seed that your friend will have to cultivate. And whether it will grow into poison ivy or a beautiful flower, only time will tell."

languages.text: "Ne? Hayır tabii ki!" {n}Cassia neredeyse bağırarak konuşup ardından utançla bakışlarını kaçırıyor.{/n} "İmmortaliumlar yeni bir başlangıcın sembolüdür. İki kişi arasındaki ilişkinin gelişmesi ve aralarında kibar bir soğukluktan fazlasının yaşanması için atılan ilk adımdır. Şimdilik arkadaşının sadece bu tohumun bakımını yapması gerekiyor. O tohumdan zehirli sarmaşık mı yoksa güzel bir çiçek mi çıkacağı ancak zamanla belli olacak."
languages.original_text: "What? No, of course not!" {n}Cassia almost shouts the words, then looks away in embarrassment.{/n} "An immortalium symbolises a beginning. A starting point from which a relationship between two people can grow, moving beyond polite indifference. For now, it is merely a seed that your friend will have to cultivate. And whether it will grow into poison ivy or a beautiful flower, only time will tell."

traits.locale_text: "Ne? Hayır tabii ki!" {n}Cassia neredeyse bağırarak konuşuyor, sonra da utançla bakışlarını kaçırıyor.{/n} "İmmortaliumlar yeni bir başlangıcın sembolüdür. İki kişi arasındaki ilişkinin gelişmesi ve aralarında kibar bir soğukluktan fazlasının yaşanması için bir başlangıç noktasıdır. Şimdilik arkadaşının sadece bu tohumun bakımını yapması gerekiyor. O tohumdan zehirli sarmaşık mı yoksa güzel bir çiçek mi çıkacağı ancak zamanla belli olacak."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
